title: Filmmaker Portfolio
description: I recently developed a website for a client who is a filmmaker and photographer. The website showcases his works and serves as a portfolio for his clients to view. Additionally, I also built a dashboard for him where he can upload and manage his works efficiently. For the backend of the website, I utilized Firebase, which provides a robust and scalable solution for storing and retrieving data. I am proud of the end result and my client is very satisfied with the functionality and design of the website. I am eager to continue building upon my skills and create more dynamic and user-friendly websites for clients in the future.
